content: 2024 all rights reserved the rounds now start at the centre of the heel sts continue with the pattern next row is row 2 from the chart on needles 1 and 4 knit stockinette sts in every row decrease the amount of sts on the needle #1 and #4 knit 2 sts together last 2 sts on the needle #1 until only 15 sts remain on the needle #1 on the needle #4 knit first 2 sts together as ssk until only 15 sts remain on the needle #4 foot continue working on the chart until 54 small size 57 medium size 60 large size row are done from the sts pick up line at the heel end toe on needles #1 and #3 the last 3 sts knit as k2tog k1 on needles #2 and #4 the first 3 sts knit as k1 ssk until only 8 sts are left in total leaving a 10 cm 4 inch tail cut yarn put a tapestry needle through sts and pull it inside the sock secure the tail weave in loose end wet block and lay out to dry written chart row 1 p1 k5 p1 k1tbl p1 k5 p1 row 2 knit as row 1 row 3 p1 k1 yo s2kp yo k1 p1 k1tbl p1 k1 yo s2kp yo k1 p1 row 4 knit as row 1 row 5 p1 k1 p3 k1 p1 k1tbl p1 k1 p3 k1 p1 row 6 knit as row 1 @knitpurldesign - © copyright 2024 all rights reserved chart stitch key purl knit yarn over k1tbl s2kp @knitpurldesign - © copyright 2024 all rights reserved
